message: This offer decreases your share by 5% in each subsequent round. Consider it.
Accept this and we can end the game early!
I propose a split that decreases by 20% for me and 5% for Bob with each round. This is fairer than previous offers.
You're decreasing your share, but I'm not increasing mine. This is my last generous offer!
Equal division seems fair given the decreasing value of our currency. Let's aim for mutual benefit here.
